unnormalised: Bore, mazo cousin, Rajesh, poilea vorsa thoddea sankashtant poddlo. Taka ek lhan vyapar suru korcho aslo, UP-antlea tachea ganvchea lagim ek dhaba. Taka Rs. 5 lakh lagtale heam vostum khatir – equipment, suruvatichi supplies, te soglem. Tanne Mudra loan-ancher aikilam, taka dislem te vatten vochpak borem.
normalised: Bore, mhozo cousin, Rajesh, piraantle poddlo mhunn sangta gelea vorsak. Taka ek dhaba suru korunk asli, UP-antlea tachea ganva lagin. Don lakh rupya zaitat - equipment, suruvaaticheo vostu, soglle te. Tanne Mudra loananchi kabar aikatakli, taka tech boro dislem.

unnormalised: To State Bank of India-chea ganvchea shakhek ghelo. Manager, Mr. Sharma, khub modot korpi aslo, Mudra-chea khal asleo veg-vegleo yojna tannem sangleo – Shishu, Kishore, Tarun. Rajesh Kishore-ak layak aslo, taka te 5 lakh-anche figures lagtale. Interest rate boro dista aslo, sumar 11.5% p.a., punn bhortuki-chi suchi… ti mhachi bhageli.
normalised: To State Bank of India che local branch-ak ghelo. Manager, Mister Sharma, ekdum help korpi aslo, Mudra-ntlea veg-vegllea scheme sangitlya - Shishu, Kishore, Tarun. Rajesh Kishore layak zalo, taka don lakh rupya zaithe mhunn sangta gelem. Interest rate bore disle, egara point panch percent p.a., punn repayment schedule... tech tough aslem.

unnormalised: Tannim taka 5 vorsam-ank bhortuk korche khatir yevzonn keli, EMIs 3 mhoine vanttleam uprant suru zatale. Poileak, dhandho halluch aslo. Poile 6 mhoine kastache asle; don EMIs chukle. Tanne ek dhiraychya fees-ak Rs. 500 dor eke pavti bharle. Tednam Mr. Sharma-n taka sanglem jevha zata tevha fattim bharpak, thorle rupiank-ui, mukhel vaddounk zopayik korunk.
normalised: Tanni plan kelo taka panch vorshamni bhortele, E-M-I disboursement zalea tin mhoineamni suru zatat. Poile pavtim, business slow aslem. Poile so mhoine tough asle; don E-M-I chukle. Tannem rupee panch so late fee dilem dor ek pavtim. Tevha Mister Sharma sangta, te prepay kar, thodde amount astana, principal fast kam kar.

unnormalised: Rajesh-an voir kastak kam korpak suru kelem, apnnachem dhaba ganvant prosiddh korun, Swiggy-er list korun. Halu halu, vostu unchlleak lagleo. Diwali ritun-ner, taka ₹1 lakh loan-acher fattim bharche khatir zoddli. Hanni tachem EMI-chem rupiank ani te saglle interest tem bhartalem tem khub zopayik kelem.
normalised: Rajesh ani jory kam karunk laglo, tache dhaba promote korunk laglo locally, Swiggy-cher list zali. Dheeren dheeren, vostu pikup korunk lagli. Diwali season-ant, rupee ek lakh prepay korunk favo zalo loan-ant. Hem zatum, tache E-M-I amount ani total interest kam zale.

unnormalised: Atam, sumar ek vorsh zalea uprant, tachem dhaba borem cholta, ani to neman EMI-chem bhortuk korta. To voir vaddounk-ui sochna dusrea vorsamni, kiteak tor ek dusrem loan gheun, punn tem lhan astolem, sumar 2 lakhs. Tannem ek moladik shikvon ghetli: sadaiv chapa-n dilole vostu vacha ani jevha zata tevha fattim bhar!
normalised: Atam, sumar voros bhitor, tache dhaba barem cholta, ani to regularly tache E-M-I payments karta. To dusrem expand korunk vichar karta don vorsham bhitor, magari dusre loan zaitam, thodde favo, don lakhani. To bori shikvani ghetli: soglle borem vacha ani prepay kar favo astana!
